title: Honor Glitch
body: Im honor 5 and i just got honored but the next game i dont reeceive a flair....

replies.body: In addition to cvija96's info, flair will only last for one match as well.  You'll want to keep getting honors to constantly show some flairs.  Congrats on reaching 5!

no i played a rank game and we lost but i got 1 honor but i was playing solo queue but the next game i played, their is no flair in the loading screen
If you got honor from a premade you dont receive a flair ( you need 2 honors from premade, or one honor from non-premade teammate).
